name: Unfair Selucreh 2 ( Demo )
description:
This is the demo to the second Unfair Selucreh game, which is an existing game my friend Nic made. 

The controls are :

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Trees with light green dots are olive trees, which you can harvest to use as currency. The currency can be traded in at the secret merchant found somewhere in the level ;)

If you would like to donate to us at Gigsjaw, my paypal is : Itslightsaber@gmail.com

Discord Server : https://discord.gg/VZSCGFw
